title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer cannot log in despite several attempts. Password reset was tried but failed. They urgently need account access as it blocks usage of important services.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer tried making a payment with Visa ending 1234, but it was declined repeatedly. Card is valid with funds, yet the issue prevents completing their purchase.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. File doesn’t generate or appears blank. This prevents them from keeping proper financial documentation.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: The app crashes instantly on Android 13 devices. Customer cannot proceed beyond the splash screen, making the app completely unusable and blocking access to features.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer is unable to update their billing address. Each attempt reverts to the old details, which may cause incorrect invoices or future payment errors.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund over two weeks ago but has not received it. They checked their bank, yet no refund appears. Delay is causing frustration.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving OTP codes on their registered phone during two-factor login. Number is correct, but messages fail, blocking secure account access completely.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer tried uploading a profile picture, but it fails every time. Different formats and devices tested, but issue continues, preventing account personalization updates.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer was charged for an unwanted subscription renewal. They planned to cancel earlier but missed the date. Now they request a refund and disable auto-renewal.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer didn’t receive an order confirmation email after payment. They checked inbox and spam, but nothing arrived. This leaves them unsure if order was processed.

title: Broken Link on Homepage
description: The 'Contact Us' link in the main navigation leads to a '404 Not Found' page. This prevents customers from easily getting support.

title: Slow Performance on Checkout
description: Website is extremely slow when navigating the checkout process. Takes over 30 seconds to load each step, leading to cart abandonment.

title: Incorrect Product Description
description: Product ID 456's description states it includes a charger, but the customer only received the main device. The product page needs correction.

title: Issue with API Integration
description: Customer's third-party application is receiving 'Authentication Failed' errors when calling the API, despite using the correct and valid API key.

title: Can't Change Language Setting
description: User is unable to switch the UI language from English to Bengali. Setting appears to save, but the interface remains in English.

title: Miscalculated Sales Tax
description: The sales tax applied to the order is 5%, but in the customer's region, the local tax rate is 7.5%. Customer was undercharged and may face issues.

title: Email Notifications Not Working
description: Customer has subscribed to all newsletters and update emails, but hasn't received any correspondence for the last week. Checked spam folder; issue persists.

title: Data Loss After Update
description: Following the latest application update (v3.1), all of the customer's saved settings and preferences have been reset or deleted.

title: Accessibility Issue: Keyboard Navigation
description: Users relying on keyboard navigation (Tab key) are unable to access the main 'Search' bar, which is a major accessibility blocker.

title: Coupon Code Not Applying
description: Customer is trying to use a valid 'SPRING20' coupon code at checkout, but the system shows an 'Invalid Code' error, preventing the discount.
